name: Impersonation
description:
The Singleplayer mode will have a Robot chasing after you and you need to get as many pieces as possible. This project isnt complete and is just a very very small demo.

E to activate levers

Wasd to walk

Holding shift will run

Mouse will rotate vision

-------------------------

This is a Multiplayer Horror game where you try to figure out which of your friends are real and who is Impersonating your friends and is really a killer robot looking to get you. (Coming Soon)
